title: Magazine Sale: Bundle 5 Subscriptions for $20 (including gifts)
content:
This weekend (through Tuesday, September 8), choose from dozens of magazines included in this Magazine Bundle Sale . Select $5 subscriptions for only $20 – and that includes gift subscriptions, new subscriptions as well as renewals. 
 
There are NO hidden fees – no auto-renewal, no tax, no shipping, no need to sign up for emails. 
 
Categories include sports and fitness, travel and entertainment, cooking, family, home, business, titles for men and women, outdoors, automobiles and more. 
 
Did you know you can gift part of your bundle to friends? 
Just select “ this will be a gift ” after you make a selection and you can send specific magazines from your bundle to a separate mailing address and even add a personalized gift note. 
 
Just a few of the popular titles you’ll find for $4 per subscription when you bundle 5 magazines for $20! 
  Allrecipes  Better Homes & Gardens  Bridal Guide  Car and Driver  Dance Spirit  Dwell  EatingWell  Elle Decor  Every Day with Rachael Ray  ESPN  FamilyFun  Family Circle  Golfweek or Golf Digest  Home Business  Motor Trend  Outside  Parents  Popular Photography  Rolling Stone  Weight Watchers  Woman’s Day  Women’s Health  Yoga Journal   Shop the Magazine Bundle Sale through Tuesday at midnight!  
  
 
The post Magazine Sale: Bundle 5 Subscriptions for $20 (including gifts) appeared first on Bargains to Bounty . If you are seeing this in another feed or site, it has been stolen. Please contact Jolyn .
